DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to evaluate the acute physiological effects of expiration with the glottis open in lateral posture (ELTGOL) and Flutter valve in dynamic and static lung volumes in patients with bronchiectasis and, secondarily, to study the effect of these techniques in sputum production.
DOC.brief_title: Physiological Effects of Expiration With the Glottis Open in Lateral Posture (ELTGOL) and Flutter Valve in Patients With Bronchiectasis
DOC.criteria: Patients with clinical and radiological criteria of bronchiectasis heart failure pneumonia chest pain inability to perform the procedures asthma cystic fibrosis
